name: INI_Editor
description:
Purpose-built INI GUI editor for my needs. **Warning:** _This is not a turnkey tool for editing INI files._
It's primarily my playing around with things. It also has some built-in examples of how to turn HTML inputs directly into a formatted JSON file.
author: iLikeToBeAnonymous

researchComments.infoLearned: Source for manual edits to this file and where to put the 'build' key.

researchComments.note: the 'win' key is a proper keyword, and it seems you can't replace it with 'foo' and expect it to work right as a parameter.
